Email.Subject: TreeView Customisation Example
Email.Message: Display hierarchical data e.g. folders structure. The top level folders and files will be shown. Selecting a folder, its content should be displayed in an new screen.

Email.Subject: RadBarcode for Xamarin
Email.Message: Hi team, we are starting building barcodes in a machine-readable format via the RadBarcode control by providing numeric or character data.

Email.Subject: NumericBox Documentation
Email.Message: RadNumericBox is a TextBox control that provides functionality for selecting numeric values within a predefined range. The control exposes a convenient API to customize its behavior to best fit customer’s business requirements.
